data.eml:eml: Revised checklist of the butterflies of Serbia (Lepidoptera: Papilionoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vеrоvnik, Rudi (2018): Revised checklist of the butterflies of Serbia (Lepidoptera: Papilionoidea). Zootaxa 4438 (3): 501-527, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4438.3.5
